subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which of the following places was the capital of Mewar Dynasty?
question_hi: मेवार संघ के विभागीय स्थान क्या है?
explanation_en: Udaipur was the capital of Mewar Dynasty during the reign of Maharana Udai Singh II.

question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan during the reign of Rao Jaisa Singh, Kishori, and Maharana Kishori ka संघ के वर षिका संघ के वर षिका संघ के वर षिका संघ के वर षिका

question_hi: राशंघ के वर षिका संघ के वर षिका सं
